channel.title: Two Sides, Kinda like C Wars
channel.description:
Hey, me and my friend are developing a new server. We are making it so theres two sides fighting, you choose a side and join it from the start. We've made most of it and now are running across a big problem. For the sake of this lets say SideA and SideB. How would we make it so the people of SideA can never attack another person of SideA at any time. But can always attack SideB person. And vise versa. (kind of like a blown up version of Cwars)
Thanks, to anyone who can help. :)

item.title: Two Sides, Kinda like C Wars
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

sinler range:

You might want to look for a cwars tut and copy some of the codes form there…just an idea[/quote][quote=“Warrior6923, post:3, topic:193266”]team capes.

Please look at the date before posting.

Read full topic
